name: Porter 80" Velvet Rolled Arm Chesterfield Sofa
description: Luxurious velvet chesterfield sofa with tufted back and rolled arms. Deep button tufting creates dramatic visual appeal. Perfect for elegant living rooms.

name: Rolled Arm Chesterfield Sofa
description: Classic chesterfield design with deep button tufting and nailhead trim. Timeless elegance meets modern comfort.

name: Quitaque 88" Rolled Arm Chesterfield Sofa
description: Extra-long chesterfield sofa with dramatic rolled arms and deep tufting. Statement piece for large living spaces.

name: 85" Velvet Tuxedo Arm Sofa
description: Elegant velvet sofa with tuxedo arms and nailhead trim. Sophisticated design with plush cushioning.

name: Camren 72" Velvet Round Arm Sofa
description: Soft velvet upholstery with gentle round arms. Contemporary style with comfortable seating.

name: 112" Wide Velvet Sofa & Chaise
description: Oversized sectional with built-in chaise. Sumptuous velvet fabric perfect for lounging.

name: Rosemead Velvet Chaise Lounge
description: Elegant chaise lounge in rich velvet. Perfect for reading nooks or bedroom corners. Victorian-inspired design.

name: Avondale Velvet Chaise Lounge
description: Dramatic fainting couch style chaise with tufted details. Ideal for adding gothic elegance to any room.

name: Brighouse Chaise Lounge
description: Contemporary chaise with clean lines and velvet upholstery. Modern comfort with classic materials.

name: Tilstone Chaise Lounge
description: Velvet chaise with silver nailhead accents. Sophisticated design with luxurious detailing.

name: Zebra Arm Chair
description: Bold zebra print upholstery makes this accent chair a true statement piece. Not for the faint of heart.

name: Toby Cow Print Task Chair
description: Office chair with full cow print upholstery. Swivel base with adjustable height. Udderly unique.

name: Gaudy 47" Wide Chenille Armchair
description: Over-the-top armchair with bright chenille fabric and ornate details. The name says it all - deliberately excessive design.

name: The Abbey Gothic Revival 19" Wide Side Chair
description: Ornately carved wooden chair with gothic architectural details. Cathedral-inspired design with pointed arches.

name: Minimal Scandinavian Dining Chair
description: Clean lines, natural wood, simple cushion. Understated Nordic design philosophy.

name: Industrial Metal Bar Stool
description: Raw steel frame with distressed leather seat. Factory-inspired design with adjustable height.

name: Rustic Farmhouse Dining Table
description: Solid reclaimed wood table with natural grain patterns. Seats 8 comfortably. Sturdy trestle base.

name: Glass Top Modern Coffee Table
description: Tempered glass top with chrome base. Minimalist design perfect for contemporary spaces.

name: Victorian Marble Side Table
description: Ornate carved legs with genuine marble top. Antique reproduction with gold leaf accents.

name: Mid-Century Walnut Console Table
description: Tapered legs, warm walnut finish, subtle curves. Classic 1960s design aesthetics.

name: Baroque Gold Accent Chair
description: Heavily gilded frame with intricate carvings. Brocade upholstery. Fit for royalty or dramatic interiors.

name: Neon Pink Velvet Pouffe
description: Bold, bright, impossible to ignore. Cylindrical ottoman in shocking pink velvet. Makes a statement.

name: Tufted Leather Wingback Chair
description: Traditional wingback design with button tufting. Rich leather upholstery. Library-worthy elegance.

name: Bohemian Macrame Hanging Chair
description: Woven macrame seat suspended from ceiling. Boho-chic relaxation spot. Includes hanging hardware.

name: Art Deco Mirrored Vanity Table
description: Geometric lines, mirrored surfaces, chrome accents. 1920s glamour meets modern functionality.

name: Oversized Bean Bag Chair
description: Giant microsuede bean bag. Swallows you whole in comfort. Perfect for gaming or lounging.

name: Rattan Peacock Chair
description: Iconic fan-back design in natural rattan. Bohemian classic from the 1970s. Statement seating.

name: Chrome Tulip Side Table
description: Space-age design with single pedestal base. White lacquer top. Inspired by mid-century modernism.

name: Distressed Leather Sofa
description: Aged leather with visible wear patterns. Industrial loft aesthetic. Comfortable and characterful.

name: Patchwork Quilted Kids Chair
description: Colorful patchwork fabric in child-sized proportions. Fun, whimsical design for playrooms.
